title.narrative: Rights and Opportunities for Poqomchí Youths

description.narrative: Rights and Opportunities for Poqomch Youths

The current project is designed to transfer the accumulated experience of ACJ-Guatemala in San Cristóbal Verapaz to the municipalities of Tactic and Santa Cruz, in addition to following up on the progress made in San Cristóbal.

The positive experience of ACJ Guatemala with the implementation of the projects in the municipality of San Cristóbal Verapaz made it feasible to extend the initiative to neighbouring municipalities such as Santa Cruz Verapaz and Tactic, both of which share similar characteristics as regards both population and geography, but unfortunately also as concerns the problem of violence against children and adolescents.

name.narrative: San Cristobal Verapaz, Alta Verapaz Department, Guatemala
Santa Cruz Verapaz, Alta Verapaz Department, Guatemala

title.narrative: Number of partners with initiatives to empower marginalised target groups (in particular women and yout)h to contribute to and--or influence policies in relation to conflict transformation of governments or other relevant stakeholders at different levels

comment.narrative: 18 youth participate as promoters in the initiative. 58 public officers participated in workshops on youth participation. 66 local authorities participated in three workshops on the importance of ludic and sports to foster youth policies.

title.narrative: Number of partners who have initiatives to empower marginalised target groups (in particular women and youth) to build sustainable conditions for conflict transformation, in particular at intra and inter community level CT&D

comment.narrative: 20 poqomchí youth participated in a capacity building process on infoactivism. Another 30 poqomchí youth graduated from a diploma course.

title.narrative: Number of our partners defending and supporting victims of sexual and gender based violence are successful as contribution to the implementation of UNSC Resolution 1325 CT&D

comment.narrative: 402 cases of violence, including sexual violence, were attended. The organization and the clinic realized approximately 40 consults per month.

title.narrative: Number of partners actively defending and supporting women and girls who have become victims of sexual and gender based violence as contribution to the implementation of UNSC Resolution 1325 CT&D

comment.narrative: 85 people (teachers, parents and youth) participated in three workshops on sexual and reproductive rights. There was an agreement to open a clinic in Tactic during 2016

title.narrative: Number of targeted marginalized groups (in particular women and youth) who have a recognizable contribution to conflict transformation, in particular at intra and inter community level CT&D

comment.narrative: A campaign was organized, including sports activities. With the organization of the festivals the organization and youth reached 1,000 people.
